description:
Enough space for the essentials to hit the trails. It includes a Hydraulics LT 2.5L hydration reservoir that rides in its own dedicated compartment to make refills a snap and protect your gear from accidental spills. Attachments for a standard or full-face helmet and interior tool organizer slots for trail side repairs.

  • Contoured AirScape back panel allows maximum ventilation while keeping the load close to the body
  • Shoulder straps and back panel have a breathable mesh overlay and soft edges
  • Women's specific design has shoulder straps that are shaped to accommodate curves and a shorter torso length
  • Full front panel U-zip to main compartment and tool organization
  • Removable webbing waistbelt
  • Front shove-it pocket lets you stash extra layers
  • Internal pocket protects sunnies or electronics
  • Dedicated hydration compartment has a huge easy-access zippered opening and includes an Osprey Hydraulics® LT reservoir with a magnetic bite-valve keeper
  • Low-profile helmet-carry attachment slips through the vents of your helmet to hold it securely in place
  • Reflective details and a loop for a blinky light keep you visible on after-dark missions
name: Osprey Salida 8 Hydration Pack - Women's
